title: IBM COS Image Upload
author: Aditya Mahakali
description:
## Overview

This Python utility provides a simple interface to interact with IBM Cloud Object Storage (COS) for file and image uploads, downloads, and management. It supports the following features:

- Upload files or images (either from file paths or as base64-encoded strings) to an IBM COS bucket.
- Fetch and download files from the COS bucket.
- List all objects in the COS bucket.
- Convert objects in COS to base64-encoded strings.
